verses.esv: 23 For the wages of sin is death, but the free gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.
verses.kjv: 23 For the wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.
verses.niv: 23 For the wages of sin is death, but the gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.

verses.esv: 7 But by the same word the heavens and earth that now exist are stored up for fire, being kept until the day of judgment and destruction of the ungodly.
verses.kjv: 7 But the heavens and the earth, which are now, by the same word are kept in store, reserved unto fire against the day of judgment and perdition of ungodly men.
verses.niv: 7 By the same word the present heavens and earth are reserved for fire, being kept for the day of judgment and destruction of ungodly men.

verses.esv: 12 While I was with them, I kept them in your name, which you have given me. I have guarded them, and not one of them has been lost except the son of destruction, that the Scripture might be fulfilled.
verses.kjv: 12 While I was with them in the world, I kept them in thy name: those that thou gavest me I have kept, and none of them is lost, but the son of perdition; that the scripture might be fulfilled.
verses.niv: 12 While I was with them, I protected them and kept them safe by that name you gave me. None has been lost except the one doomed to destruction so that Scripture would be fulfilled.

verses.esv: 16 “For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
verses.kjv: 16 For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
verses.niv: 16 "For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

verses.esv: 41 “Then he will say to those on his left, ‘Depart from me, you cursed, into the eternal fire prepared for the devil and his angels.
verses.kjv: 41 Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand, Depart from me, ye cursed, into everlasting fire, prepared for the devil and his angels:
verses.niv: 41 "Then he will say to those on his left, 'Depart from me, you who are cursed, into the eternal fire prepared for the devil and his angels.

verses.esv: 27 And just as it is appointed for man to die once, and after that comes judgment,
verses.kjv: 27 And as it is appointed unto men once to die, but after this the judgment:
verses.niv: 27 Just as man is destined to die once, and after that to face judgment,

verses.esv: 28 And do not fear those who kill the body but cannot kill the soul. Rather fear him who can destroy both soul and body in hell.
verses.kjv: 28 And fear not them which kill the body, but are not able to kill the soul: but rather fear him which is able to destroy both soul and body in hell.
verses.niv: 28 Do not be afraid of those who kill the body but cannot kill the soul. Rather, be afraid of the One who can destroy both soul and body in hell.

verses.esv: 22 But I say to you that everyone who is angry with his brother will be liable to judgment; whoever insults his brother will be liable to the council; and whoever says, ‘You fool!’ will be liable to the hell of fire.
verses.kjv: 22 But I say unto you, That whosoever is angry with his brother without a cause shall be in danger of the judgment: and whosoever shall say to his brother, Raca, shall be in danger of the council: but whosoever shall say, Thou fool, shall be in danger of hell fire.
verses.niv: 22 But I tell you that anyone who is angry with his brother will be subject to judgment. Again, anyone who says to his brother, 'Raca, 'is answerable to the Sanhedrin. But anyone who says, 'You fool!' will be in danger of the fire of hell.

verses.esv: 20 And the beast was captured, and with it the false prophet who in its presence had done the signs by which he deceived those who had received the mark of the beast and those who worshiped its image. These two were thrown alive into the lake of fire that burns with sulfur.
verses.kjv: 20 And the beast was taken, and with him the false prophet that wrought miracles before him, with which he deceived them that had received the mark of the beast, and them that worshipped his image. These both were cast alive into a lake of fire burning with brimstone.
verses.niv: 20 But the beast was captured, and with him the false prophet who had performed the miraculous signs on his behalf. With these signs he had deluded those who had received the mark of the beast and worshiped his image. The two of them were thrown alive into the fiery lake of burning sulfur.

verses.kjv: 7 Even as Sodom and Gomorrha, and the cities about them in like manner, giving themselves over to fornication, and going after strange flesh, are set forth for an example, suffering the vengeance of eternal fire.
verses.niv: 1 Jude, a servant of Jesus Christ and a brother of James, To those who have been called, who are loved by God the Father and kept by Jesus Christ:

verses.esv: 3 Let no one deceive you in any way. For that day will not come, unless the rebellion comes first, and the man of lawlessness is revealed, the son of destruction,
verses.kjv: 3 Let no man deceive you by any means: for that day shall not come, except there come a falling away first, and that man of sin be revealed, the son of perdition;
verses.niv: 3 Don't let anyone deceive you in any way, for that day will not come until the rebellion occurs and the man of lawlessness is revealed, the man doomed to destruction.

verses.esv: 17 Then we who are alive, who are left, will be caught up together with them in the clouds to meet the Lord in the air, and so we will always be with the Lord.
verses.kjv: 17 Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord.
verses.niv: 17 After that, we who are still alive and are left will be caught up together with them in the clouds to meet the Lord in the air. And so we will be with the Lord forever.

verses.esv: 46 And these will go away into eternal punishment, but the righteous into eternal life.”
verses.kjv: 46 And these shall go away into everlasting punishment: but the righteous into life eternal.
verses.niv: 46 "Then they will go away to eternal punishment, but the righteous to eternal life."

verses.esv:
24   The path of life leads upward for the prudent,
    that he may turn away from Sheol beneath.
verses.kjv: 24 The way of life is above to the wise, that he may depart from hell beneath.
verses.niv: 24 The path of life leads upward for the wise to keep him from going down to the grave.

verses.esv:
11   Sheol and Abaddon lie open before the LORD;
    how much more the hearts of the children of man!
verses.kjv: 11 Hell and destruction are before the LORD: how much more then the hearts of the children of men?
verses.niv: 11 Death and Destruction lie open before the LORD - how much more the hearts of men!

verses.esv: 8 But as for the cowardly, the faithless, the detestable, as for murderers, the sexually immoral, sorcerers, idolaters, and all liars, their portion will be in the lake that burns with fire and sulfur, which is the second death.”
verses.kjv: 8 But the fearful, and unbelieving, and the abominable, and murderers, and whoremongers, and sorcerers, and idolaters, and all liars, shall have their part in the lake which burneth with fire and brimstone: which is the second death.
verses.niv: 8 But the cowardly, the unbelieving, the vile, the murderers, the sexually immoral, those who practice magic arts, the idolaters and all liars--their place will be in the fiery lake of burning sulfur. This is the second death."

verses.esv:
27   For you will not abandon my soul to Hades,
    or let your Holy One see corruption.
verses.kjv: 27 Because thou wilt not leave my soul in hell, neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption.
verses.niv: 27 because you will not abandon me to the grave, nor will you let your Holy One see decay.

verses.esv: 5 But I will warn you whom to fear: fear him who, after he has killed, has authority to cast into hell. Yes, I tell you, fear him!
verses.kjv: 5 But I will forewarn you whom ye shall fear: Fear him, which after he hath killed hath power to cast into hell; yea, I say unto you, Fear him.
verses.niv: 5 But I will show you whom you should fear: Fear him who, after the killing of the body, has power to throw you into hell. Yes, I tell you, fear him.

verses.esv: 33 You serpents, you brood of vipers, how are you to escape being sentenced to hell?
verses.kjv: 33 Ye serpents, ye generation of vipers, how can ye escape the damnation of hell?
verses.niv: 33 "You snakes! You brood of vipers! How will you escape being condemned to hell?

verses.esv:
17   The wicked shall return to Sheol,
    all the nations that forget God.
verses.kjv: 17 The wicked shall be turned into hell, and all the nations that forget God.
verses.niv: 17 The wicked return to the grave, all the nations that forget God.

verses.esv: 14 Then Death and Hades were thrown into the lake of fire. This is the second death, the lake of fire.
verses.kjv: 14 And death and hell were cast into the lake of fire. This is the second death.
verses.niv: 14 Then death and Hades were thrown into the lake of fire. The lake of fire is the second death.

verses.esv: 8 The beast that you saw was, and is not, and is about to rise from the bottomless pit and go to destruction. And the dwellers on earth whose names have not been written in the book of life from the foundation of the world will marvel to see the beast, because it was and is not and is to come.
verses.kjv: 8 The beast that thou sawest was, and is not; and shall ascend out of the bottomless pit, and go into perdition: and they that dwell on the earth shall wonder, whose names were not written in the book of life from the foundation of the world, when they behold the beast that was, and is not, and yet is.
verses.niv: 8 The beast, which you saw, once was, now is not, and will come up out of the Abyss and go to his destruction. The inhabitants of the earth whose names have not been written in the book of life from the creation of the world will be astonished when they see the beast, because he once was, now is not, and yet will come.

verses.esv: 7 Also it was allowed to make war on the saints and to conquer them. And authority was given it over every tribe and people and language and nation,
verses.kjv: 7 And it was given unto him to make war with the saints, and to overcome them: and power was given him over all kindreds, and tongues, and nations.
verses.niv: 7 He was given power to make war against the saints and to conquer them. And he was given authority over every tribe, people, language and nation.

verses.esv: 4 For if God did not spare angels when they sinned, but cast them into hell and committed them to chains of gloomy darkness to be kept until the judgment;
verses.kjv: 4 For if God spared not the angels that sinned, but cast them down to hell, and delivered them into chains of darkness, to be reserved unto judgment;
verses.niv: 4 For if God did not spare angels when they sinned, but sent them to hell, putting them into gloomy dungeons to be held for judgment;

verses.esv: 9 They will suffer the punishment of eternal destruction, away from the presence of the Lord and from the glory of his might,
verses.kjv: 9 Who shall be punished with everlasting destruction from the presence of the Lord, and from the glory of his power;
verses.niv: 9 They will be punished with everlasting destruction and shut out from the presence of the Lord and from the majesty of his power
